sources.title: Carry On at Your Convenience
sources.description: A somewhat work shy shop steward finds himself at loggerheads with the management at a lavatory factory. Much to his horror, his daughter is dating the boss's son, but his mood improves when he discovers that his hitherto mute budgie has a very special and potentially lucrative talent - tipping race horses.

metadata.Plot: This is the tale of industrial strife at WC Boggs' Lavatory factory. Vic Spanner is the union representative who calls a strike at the drop of a hat; eventually everyone has to get fed up with him. This is also the ideal opportunity for lots of lavatorial jokes...
metadata.Actors: Sidney James, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey
